page.title: 11Games children play 1
page.content: At school we play many games.Here are some of their names Nip and Run, British Bull Dogs,Chain,Rounders and Three,Two,One.In Nip and Run we have one wicket near the wall and another opposite in the middle of the yard. Sombody has a cricket bat and one bowls.If the the person bats or nips the ball with the bat,that person has to run to the other wicket before somebody hits it with the ball.If aperson gets the batter out another person is in.When we play Chain we use a big yard.One person is on it and has to catch the other people. After he's caught some they all hold hands.The last one left is on it next.In Three, Two,One someone is on it.That person must stay on one side of the yard.The other people must line up on the other side.The person that is on it must turn round and face the wall.
